previewArticle.title: Mexico vs. Cameroon: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group A Preview

recapArticle.title: Mexico 1, Cameroon 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group A Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Lord BAZINGA™
timelineItems.text: Mucho mejor México, muy vertical. Camerún con más balón pero a verlas venir. #MEXvsCMR

timelineItems.name: An Idle Sporting Man
timelineItems.text: I suppose Chicha didn't have a great #EPL season, but I'm not sure I'd leave such a potent offensive weapon on the bench if I'm #MEX coach

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Mexico. Héctor Herrera tries a through ball, but Giovani dos Santos is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Josh Ringler
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOFFSIDE! #WorldCup #MEXvsCMR

timelineItems.name: Psych0-42
timelineItems.text: Le Mexique domine ! Hors-jeu ? #MEX - #CAM

timelineItems.name: Fortius
timelineItems.text: @dreadjuge Les lions vont bouffer les aigles mexicains Début de match laborieux, mais ça ira #cmr VS #mex

timelineItems.name: David Terry

timelineItems.name: Fabrice Le Lous
timelineItems.text: En 110 minutos de mundial, 1 penal inventado, 2 goles mal anulados. Eso era gol de #Mex ... El Mundial de Brasil comienza bien.

timelineItems.name: Ivan Vivar
timelineItems.text: Cameroon wins a corner. Mexico has to be careful they are much much smaller. #MEXvCMR

timelineItems.name: Brandon
